statements: SELECT * FROM retail_store_sales WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, total_sales, sale_date FROM retail_store_sales WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT store_id, sale_date, total_sales FROM retail_store_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT total_sales, store_id, sale_time FROM retail_store_sales ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT store_id, sale_date, total_sales FROM retail_store_sales GROUP BY store_id HAVING SUM(total_sales) > 5000;
SELECT store_id, sale_date, total_sales FROM retail_store_sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM retail_store_sales WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC, sale_time ASC;
SELECT store_id, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales_sum FROM retail_store_sales GROUP BY store_id ORDER BY total_sales_sum DESC;
SELECT store_id, sale_date, sale_time, total_sales FROM retail_store_sales WHERE total_sales BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(store_id) AS total_stores, AVG(total_sales) AS avg_sales FROM retail_store_sales;
SELECT * FROM store_sales;
SELECT store_id, sale_amount FROM store_sales WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM store_sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT store_id, MAX(sale_amount) FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT store_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT store_id, sale_amount, sale_time FROM store_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_time DESC;
SELECT opening_time, closing_time, store_id FROM store_hours WHERE opening_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY store_id;
SELECT store_id, sale_amount FROM store_sales WHERE sale_amount < 500 AND sale_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount, store_id FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_id ORDER BY max_sale_amount DESC;
SELECT store_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_id HAVING total_sales > 10 ORDER BY avg_sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM store_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM store_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT store_location, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_location;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM store_inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT day_of_week, opening_time, closing_time FROM store_hours WHERE store_location = 'New York' ORDER BY day_of_week ASC;
SELECT * FROM store_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, store_location, sale_amount FROM store_sales WHERE store_location = 'New York' AND sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT store_location, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_location;
SELECT si.product_name, si.stock_quantity, si.unit_price FROM store_inventory si JOIN store_sales ss ON si.product_id = ss.sale_id WHERE ss.sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY si.unit_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sh.store_location, sh.day_of_week, sh.opening_time, sh.closing_time FROM store_hours sh WHERE sh.day_of_week = 'Monday' AND (sh.opening_time >= '08:00:00' AND sh.closing_time <= '18:00:00');
SELECT * FROM store_sales;
SELECT sale_amount, sale_time FROM store_sales ORDER BY sale_time DESC;
SELECT store_id, sale_amount FROM store_sales WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT store_id, MAX(sale_amount) FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT store_id, total_sales, total_expenses FROM store_profitability WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM store_sales ORDER BY sale_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT store_id, sale_amount FROM store_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT store_id, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales FROM store_profitability GROUP BY store_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT si.product_id, si.product_quantity, ss.sale_amount FROM store_inventory si INNER JOIN store_sales ss ON si.store_id = ss.store_id;
SELECT sh.store_id, sh.day_of_week, sh.opening_time, sh.closing_time, sp.total_sales FROM store_hours sh INNER JOIN store_profitability sp ON sh.store_id = sp.store_id ORDER BY sp.total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM store_transactions;
SELECT store_id, transaction_amount, transaction_time FROM store_transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_sales FROM store_transactions WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, product_name, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT store_id, opening_time, closing_time FROM store_hours WHERE store_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM store_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT store_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM store_sales GROUP BY store_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT store_id, product_name, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT store_id, opening_time, closing_time FROM store_hours WHERE store_id = 123 OR store_id = 456;
SELECT store_id, most_profitable_time FROM store_profitability WHERE most_profitable_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
